titleStmt.title: To MESSRS BEALE & CO.,James Beale, hosier and glover at 131 New Bond Street. CD had been buying from him since Jan 1841 (see Pilgrim Letters 3, p. 410n); his accounts show roughly annual payments from 1841 onward. [12 SEPTEMBER 1847]
